Buttons

A list of all the uses and types of our buttons

Add

The add button should be used in the case of adding of accepting an action.

The `size` property can be *xs*, *sm*, *md*, *lg*. Type is a string value that is used for the placeholder. Icon value takes the name of the icon following the ion- prefix.
{{> snippets/buttons/button.add size="sm" text="Add Action" icon="search" }}

Back

The add button should be used in the case of adding of accepting an action.

The `size` property can be *xs*, *sm*, *md*, *lg*. Type is a string value that is used for the placeholder. Icon value takes the name of the icon following the ion- prefix.
{{> snippets/buttons/button.back size="sm" text="Back Action" icon="close" }}

Cancel

The add button should be used in the case of adding of accepting an action.

The `size` property can be *xs*, *sm*, *md*, *lg*. Type is a string value that is used for the placeholder. Icon value takes the name of the icon following the ion- prefix.
{{> snippets/buttons/button.cancel size="sm" text="Cancel Action" icon="close" }}

Popover

The add button should be used in the case of adding of accepting an action.

The `size` property can be *xs*, *sm*, *md*, *lg*. Type is a string value that is used for the placeholder. Icon value takes the name of the icon following the ion- prefix.
{{> snippets/buttons/button.popover size="sm" text="Initiate a Popover" icon="close" }}

Remove

The add button should be used in the case of adding of accepting an action.

The `size` property can be *xs*, *sm*, *md*, *lg*. Type is a string value that is used for the placeholder. Icon value takes the name of the icon following the ion- prefix.
{{> snippets/buttons/button.remove size="sm" text="Remove Action" icon="close" }}
